name: StayAtHome (suchagamestudios)
description:
Deadly disease spreads across the world,  you are one of the last survivors out there. The end is inevitable, but you need to fight not to become a victim, flee from spreading disease cloud, fight rabid walkers and don't get caught by one, jump through all kind of obstacles on your way. It's not an easy task, how long can you last? That's what she said..

Use "Up" arrow to jump,  "Space" to shoot fire.
